name: HyperBoy
description:
A side scroll platformer made for the "Retro Platformer Jam", the story is simple, a evil genius is trying to destroy the world and you has to stop it all. (there was no time to develop a cut scene).

For those who wants to play in keyboard:

Arrows Move

Z = Jump

X = Dash

C = Shoot

Some art bundles were used:

For the character: https://s4m-ur4i.itch.io/metroidvania-pixelart-characters

For the level:  https://opengameart.org/content/omega-team

[Updates on Windows Version]

- Add Health collectable

- Level Improviments
